00031         // TODO Auto-generated destructor stub

00034 
00035 DateFormat::DateFormat(string format)
00036 {
00037         this->formatspec  = format;
00038 }
00039 
00040 string DateFormat::format(Date date)
00041 {
00042         string temp = this->formatspec;
00043         boost::replace_first(temp,"hh",date.getHhStr());
00044         boost::replace_first(temp,"mi",date.getMmStr());
00045         boost::replace_first(temp,"ss",date.getSsStr());
00046         boost::replace_first(temp,"ddd",date.getDayw());
00047         boost::replace_first(temp,"dd",date.getDayStr());
00048         boost::replace_first(temp,"mmm",date.getMonthw());
00049         boost::replace_first(temp,"mm",date.getMonthStr());
00050         boost::replace_first(temp,"yyyy",date.getYearStr());
00051         boost::replace_first(temp,"yy",date.getYearStr().substr(2));
00052         return temp;
00053 }
00054 
00055 Date* DateFormat::parse(string strdate)
00056 {
00057         string temp = this->formatspec;
00058         Date* date = new Date;
00059         if(temp.find("yyyy")!=string::npos)
00060         {
00061                 string yrf = strdate.substr(temp.find("yyyy"),4);
00062                 date->setYearf(yrf);
00063         }
00064         if(temp.find("ddd")!=string::npos)
00065         {
00066                 string yrf = strdate.substr(temp.find("ddd"),3);
00067                 date->setDayw(yrf);
00068         }
00069         if(temp.find("mmm")!=string::npos)
00070         {
00071                 string yrf = strdate.substr(temp.find("mmm"),3);
00072                 date->setMonthw(yrf);
00073         }
00074         if(temp.find("mm")!=string::npos)
00075         {
00076                 string yrf = strdate.substr(temp.find("mm"),2);
00077                 date->setMmf(yrf);
00078         }
00079         if(temp.find("dd")!=string::npos)
00080         {
00081                 string yrf = strdate.substr(temp.find("dd"),2);
00082                 date->setDayf(yrf);
00083         }
00084         if(temp.find("hh")!=string::npos)
00085         {
00086                 string yrf = strdate.substr(temp.find("hh"),2);
00087                 date->setHhf(yrf);
00088         }
00089         if(temp.find("mi")!=string::npos)
00090         {
00091                 string yrf = strdate.substr(temp.find("mi"),2);
00092                 date->setMif(yrf);
00093         }
00094         if(temp.find("ss")!=string::npos)
00095         {
00096                 string yrf = strdate.substr(temp.find("ss"),2);
00097                 date->setSsf(yrf);
00098         }
00099         return date;
00100 }
